items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

content.body:
### Shop 325/50R22 Tire Size 
325/50R22 tires are a common fit on 1500- and 2500-series light trucks, especially when you’re looking for some extra ground clearance.If your truck is equipped with four wheel drive, you’re probably in the market for an all-terrain or mud terrain tire that offers great traction off the pavement with an aggressive tread pattern and a reinforced casing that can hold up under rough off-road use.

Looking for a new set of 325/50R22 tires for your truck? Consider all-terrain tires like the Nitto Recon Grappler A/T, [Yokohama Geolandar AT G015](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-at-g015), and Hankook Dynapro AT2 Xtreme (RF12) if you need a set of 325/50R22 tires that performs on- and off-road. For a mud terrain tire, check out the Toyo Open Country M/T, [Mickey Thompson Baja Boss M/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/mickey-thompson-tires/baja-boss-m-t), and Amp Terrain Attack M/T A as each tire features a reinforced casing and aggressive tread pattern that make them a great choice in heavy off-road driving.

Whether you need an all-terrain, mud terrain, or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 325/50R22 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
